heading: How to ship your product through SMSA
bannerCaption: Don't worry, Soum guarantees you free and secure shipping

title.two: Head to nearest Samsa branch for shipping
title.three: Track your product status through the App
title.four: Transfer the money to your bank account

caption.one: Reset the factory settings and prepare the accessories (if any) before heading to the shipping office
caption.two: Upon arrival, present the shipping waybill sent via WhatsApp. To find the nearest Samsa branch <external_link>From here</external_link>
caption.three: You will receive automatic updates regarding the shipping status of the product and its arrival to the buyer through the application
caption.four: The purchase amount will be securely transferred to your bank account within 24 hours of the buyer receiving the product
